mapper.delete: delete from calendar where title = #{title} and startTime = #{startTime}
delete from calendar where title = #{title} and startTime = #{startTime} and endTime = #{endTime} and allDay=#{allDay}
mapper.update: update calendar set title=#{vo.title}, startTime=#{vo.startTime}, endTime=#{vo.endTime}, allDay=#{vo.allDay} where idx=#{vo.idx}
